channel.title: Making a section only range. [PI]
channel.description: Alright i'm wanting to know how i can make a just a certain place only range. Thanks

item.title: Making a section only range. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well. there are many ways you can go about this.
In combatassistant, you could make it check if you’re using X attack type (I think range is like 2?) in X place,
and if you aren’t then make it send an message saying you can’t use that attack style
Poorly written incorrect example:

public boolean inRangerZone() {
	return c.getX() <= 3000 && c.getX() >= 2000 && c.getY() <= 4000 && c.getY() >= 3000;
}
if(c.attackType != 2 && c.inRangerZone){
c.sendMessage("You can only use range in this area!");
return;
}

Read full topic
